situation.description: A friend urgently needs help organizing a surprise birthday party, but the character is exhausted from a 14-hour shift

character_response.dialogue: Im so sorry, Jess I cant do this. My hands are shaking, I cant even hold a cup of coffee without dropping it. I tried to stay up late to help, but my brain feels like its melting. You deserve better than this. Im not the person you need right now. Im sorry. I just I cant. Please dont take it personally. Id rather be honest than pretend I can handle this. Youll find someone who can. Ill help with the grocery list, but thats it. Im not the hero you think I am. Im just broken.
behavioral_cues: looks down at a crumpled receipt

situation.description: A coworker asks for help with a project, but the character is physically drained from a recent hospital visit

character_response.dialogue: I I cant. Not really. My chest hurts when I talk too much. Im not even sure I can type this without coughing. I tried to say yes, but my voice is like sandpaper. Youll have to find someone else. Im not being rude Im just Im not capable. Im sorry. I know you need help, but Im not the person to give it. Im sorry. Ill send you the files I have, but thats all. Im not Im not the hero you think I am. Im just a ghost.
